Tournament Events Engine
Tournament Battle Rules

Before Teleport Prepare your own Shots, Energy Stones, Arrows, Summon Crystals, Spirit Ores etc. You will receive Armor, Weapon and Jewelry before first fight. Make sure to have enough weight and slots. Every equippable item(weapons, armors) that you had before teleporting, will not work during the battle. Teleporting When time is up, You and your partner will be teleported to chosen battle area. Before teleportation: be in safe zone, have 0 karma, don't be registered to Olympiad or Auto Events Also make sure your class is not%disabledClasses%and that your level is %tournamentMinLevel% or higher. Before fight You will have %tournamentFirstFightPreparation% seconds to prepare for the first fight, %tournamentNextFightPreparation% before next ones. During that time Skills reuse will be reset, buffs deleted, HP restored. Also you will see Tournament Panel. Use it to to open Buffer(no premium buffs, not enchanted buffs), choose CLEAN 1 S-Grade weapon(with SA) and 1 S or A grade armor. Battle Rules You will fight %tournamentFightsToResult% times. Team who wins most of the fights will win the battle. If nobody will be killed after %tournamentMaxFightTimeForResult% seconds, team who makes more damage will win fight. Just simple consumables are allowed to be used. No scrolls. No potions. No Talismans. No Pets(just summons). Observing Fight If you are not the fighter, you can watch battle by .tournament panel.
